summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5814 for the improvement of West Bertona Street, from 38th Avenue West to West Viewmont Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76640 as amended by Ordinance No. 76849 and 77347, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
